panels.description: 视频引擎频率。
panels.title: GPU Video Clock

panels.description:
### Clock Throttle Reasons,value mapping:
* 1 --> GPU_IDLE: Nothing is running on the GPU and the clocks are dropping to Idle state 
* 2 --> CLOCKS_SETTING:  GPU clocks are limited by current setting of applications clocks
* 4 --> SW_POWER_CAP: SW Power Scaling algorithm is reducing the clocks below requested clocks
*  8 --> HW_SLOWDOWN: HW Slowdown (reducing the core clocks by a factor of 2 or more) is engaged
* 10 --> SYNC_BOOST: This GPU has been added to a Sync boost group with nvidia-smi or DCGM in order to maximize performance per watt. 
* 20 --> SW_THERMAL:  SW Thermal Slowdown
* 80 --> POWER_BRAKE: HW Power Brake Slowdown 
* 100 --> DISPLAY_CLOCKS: GPU clocks are limited by current setting of Display clocks

### Others:
* These GPUs are assigned to selected pods
* If multiple pods share a GPU card, the metric value is affected by these pods
panels.title: GPU-Clock Throttle Reasons

panels.description:
节点GPU卡通过PCIe总线接收的数据速率。* These GPUs are assigned to selected pods
* If multiple pods share a GPU card, the metric value is affected by these pods
* Note that this is from the perspective of the GPU, so copying data from host to device (HtoD)
